title: Charles Hoskinson ponders recruitment of teen who hacked Nvidia
description: In a recent turn of events, Charles Hoskinson, the founder of IOG and the Cardano blockchain, engaged in a light-hearted Twitter exchange regarding Arion Kurtaj, an 18-year-old hacker associated with the notorious group Lapsus$. This interaction comes after Kurtaj’s recent high-profile cyber-attacks on major technology companies. Teen hacker’s bold cyberattacks Arion Kurtaj, an Oxford-based teenager […]
